CustomField.formula:
IF ( NOT( ISBLANK(Price__c)) && Subscription_License_Term_Months__c < 12, Price__c * Number_of_Licensed_Named_Users__c *Subscription_License_Term_Months__c ,
If ( NOT(ISBLANK(Price__c)) && Subscription_License_Term_Months__c >= 12, MRR__c * 12,
IF (ISBLANK (Price__c) && ISBLANK ( Committed_Rate__c ) && ISPICKVAL ( Billing_Frequency__c, 'Quarterly'), Commitment_Amount__c * 4,
IF (ISBLANK (Price__c) && ISBLANK (Committed_Rate__c) && ISPICKVAL ( Billing_Frequency__c, 'Annually'), Commitment_Amount__c,
IF (ISBLANK (Price__c) && ISBLANK (Committed_Rate__c) && ISPICKVAL ( Billing_Frequency__c, 'Monthly'), Commitment_Amount__c *12,
If (ISBLANK (Price__c) && Subscription_License_Term_Months__c <= 12, Committed_Rate__c * Committed_Minutes__c * Subscription_License_Term_Months__c,
If (ISBLANK (Price__c) && Subscription_License_Term_Months__c > 12, Committed_Rate__c * Committed_Minutes__c * 12,0 )))))))
CustomField.label: ACV
